channel.title: Plz help me its 1 error and i cant compile..lol
channel.description:
guys help me i keep getting this error everytime i compile itemspawnpoints.java:31: ')' expected spawntimer = 100; ^
help plzzzzzzzzz

item.title: Plz help me its 1 error and i cant compile..lol
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

it gives me another error but ill check if it compilers right[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2008, 09:19:16 am[/size][hr]nope.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2008, 09:24:13 am[/size][hr]this is the entire file.
// Item Spawn Points by xerozcheez
import java.io.*;

public class itemspawnpoints {
public int spawntimer = 0;

public void LoadItems() {
    for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++) {
        if (spawntimer <= 1) {
            ItemHandler.addItem(2414, 3118, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Zammy Cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(2412, 3119, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Sara Cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(2413, 3120, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // guthix cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(1038, 2734, 3473, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // red partyhat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1040, 2739, 3470, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // yellow partyhat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1042, 2735, 3466, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // blue partyhat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1046, 2742, 3464, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // purple partyhat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1048, 2744, 3470, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // white partyhat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1359, 2312, 9804, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // rune axe
            ItemHandler.addItem(1359, 2314, 9804, 1,
          
            spawntimer = 100);

           
        }
    }
}

public void process() {
    LoadItems();
    spawntimer -= 1;
}

}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2008, 10:10:54 am[/size][hr]nvm i got it to work thanks tho for everyone who helped!
